participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily loves to find beauty in the world around her and enjoys sharing her experiences through photography.
participant_1.background: I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs. I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell. I'm not a weather person. I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what. I enjoy photographing nature and my pets.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Determined and thoughtful, Jordan channels his experiences into poetry and values strength in both physical and emotional aspects of life.
participant_2.background: I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind. I write poems about my life and my culture. My favorite show is CSI. I am buying a house. I want to learn how to be more assertive in my business.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It is going well, thank you! I have just been relaxing and doing some photography.
Oh nice, what kind of photography do you enjoy doing?
I enjoy photographing nature and my pets. I also enjoy taking pictures of my friends and family.
That sounds really fun! I have always wanted to learn how to take better photos.
It is not too hard to get into! There are a lot of great resources online that can help you learn the basics.
I will have to look into that! I am also really interested in learning how to write poems.
That is awesome! I love writing poems. It is a great way to express yourself.
I agree! I think it is a really creative outlet.
What kind of poems do you like to write?
I like to write about my life and my culture. I also like to write poems about things that are important to me.
That sounds really interesting! I would love to read some of your poems sometime.
Sure! I would be happy to share them with you.
